task_summary: A robot arm pours from a bottle into a mug placed on a table.

task_long_description.overview: The episode involves a fixed-base robot manipulator equipped with a bottle positioned above a mug, which sits on a table. The robot must detect the mug, move into position above it, and pour the contents of the bottle into the mug with controlled tilt. The table is clear and stationary. The bottle is already held by the robot; no grasping action is required. Key constraints are precise alignment over the mug and stable pour without spills.
preconditions: Bottle is firmly grasped by the robot gripper
Mug is present and visible on the table
stepwise_plan: Detect the mug on the table
Move above the mug to an offset position
Pour from the bottle into the mug by tilting 90 degrees
success_criteria: Liquid visibly transfers from bottle to mug
No major spills occur during transfer
Robot arm retreats safely after pouring
failure_and_recovery: If the mug is not detected: abort or re-scan
If approach positioning fails: retry or abort
If liquid is not observed to transfer: verify alignment and retry pour if safe
task_long_description.termination: The task terminates when the retreat motion is complete following a successful pour into the mug.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Detects the mug on the table.
Moves the end-effector above the mug with vertical offset.
Fine approach and alignment with the mug.
Pours from the held bottle into the mug at 90 degree tilt.
Moves the robot end-effector away from the mug after pouring.

failure_modes: Pour action fails or bottle malfunctions
recovery_strategy: Retry mug detection if first detection fails
Re-align and try again if pouring is misaligned
Abort or stop if unexpected contact/spill is detected
assumptions: Bottle is already grasped by the robot at episode start, as implied by all frames
No grasp actions needed; pour performed directly
Instruction matches observed sequential pour into mug; no mismatch

expected_success_criteria: Liquid poured from bottle into mug without major spill
